name: Dreamstory: RPG Game
description:
Disclaimer:

This game is still in development, and this build is unfinished. Things are destined to change before final release.

Dreamstory follows the story of a sentient robot created by a scientist, that flies away to a planet called Orbem Alternis. Here, Starstorm meets Dreamcast, and The Scientist meets a deadly and powerful force.

There is currently around 10-15 minutes of playtime in this game. There are 3 out of the 9 planned secret bosses.

Feedback is appreciated!
